name: Motospace VR
description:
We worked with our friends at Skive to create this online b2b training tool for Motorola resellers. The tool is comprised of three main sections:

  • Learn Moto, where users get to grips with the latest handsets
  • Know Moto, where users are tested on products and can earn points
  • Live Moto, where users can spend their points on various prizes.

The tool was built with content management and multilingual support in mind so it could be rolled out in multiple markets.
